name: Lock'd Up
description:
You don't remember why you're locked in here but you know you need to get out. As you progress through each level, you may notice in the top left that your abilities will lock and unlock. Make sure to pay attention to the icons as you try to reach the door at the end of each level!

Controls:

Space to Jump

WASD or Arrows for movement

F to Dash

This game does have controller support but it likes to break often so I wouldn't recommend it.
